author: remm
msg: - Remove special root and global loggers handling (it seems useless to me). global will simply delegate, so that it will always use the JVM configuration.
- Remove some if(securityManager), which is only really useful in the critical path (the methods concerned were already synchromized, so ...).

author: remm
msg: - Fix NPEs when context CL is null, which occurs in JNI mode (cool feature ...).

author: remm
msg: - Add a sample default configuration. Webapps can use their own configuration by having a logging.properties in their own classloader.
- Fix useParentHandlers initialization (it tended to be always set to false).
- The necessary system property is not present yet, however (-Djava.util.logging.manager=org.apache.juli.ClassLoaderLogManager is needed
in JAVA_OPTS or CATALINA_OPTS). Some hacking of the startup scripts is needed.
